title: EEG Motor Movement/Imagery Dataset
description: A large dataset of EEG recordings from subjects performing motor movement and motor imagery tasks. Includes data from 109 subjects performing 14 different motor tasks.
full_description: This dataset consists of EEG recordings from 109 volunteers, each performing 14 experimental runs: two baseline runs (one with eyes open, one with eyes closed), and four runs of each of the following tasks: opening and closing left or right fist as specified by a cue on screen; imagining opening and closing left or right fist as specified by a cue on screen; and opening and closing both fists or both feet as specified by a cue on screen. Subjects were fitted with an EEG cap with 64 electrodes positioned according to the international 10-20 system, with a sampling rate of 160 Hz.
citation: Goldberger A., Amaral L., Glass L., et al. (2023). EEG Motor Movement/Imagery Dataset. Example Journal of Neuroscience Data, 15(2), 123-145.
